name: XCard
description: Tweet to translated card PNG + AI social post generator

endpoints.name: generate_card
endpoints.description: Generate a translated card PNG from a tweet URL. Returns base64-encoded PNG image + metadata

endpoints.name: fetch_tweet
endpoints.description: Fetch tweet data (text, author, metrics, images) without generating a card

endpoints.name: generate_social_post
endpoints.description: Generate an AI social media post (Traditional Chinese) from a tweet URL
